title: FOIA Request, GAO
abstract:
April 15, 2008
Mr. Timothy P. Bowling
Chief Quality Officer
Government Accountability Office
Washington, DC 20548
 
 
Ref. PRI-08-097
Dear Mr. Bowling:
I would like to thank you again for your very prompt responsive answer to my previous 
request for records pertaining to the federal legislative histories contract with Thom-
son West Publishing Corporation.  I have one ﬁnal request for records on this topic.
I would like to ﬁrst thank you for clearing up the misunderstandings about the way
